get.summary: Get a data policy operation by its ID.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The data policy operation specified by ID.

post.summary: Export personal data for a native identity when called by a tenant admin.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The native identity object Id.

post.summary:
AccountClose in a resource tenant. This call is used by a tenant admin to 
                remove any data associated with a user that has traversed into their tenant.
                The target tenant id is inferred from the caller's identity.

AccountClose called from a home tenant to delete data in a resource tenant. 
                This call is invoked by the user to remove any data associated with them in a resource tenant.
                The target tenant id is included in the url.

parameters.name: X-Family-Json-Web-Token

get.summary:
An API that always returns an empty HTTP status code 200 OK success response.
                Use this as a heartbeat for the service and register with software load balancer
                to maintain VIP status.
get.description: May return T:System.Net.HttpStatusCode if the server is preparing to stop.

get.summary: An API that always returns a copy of the OpenApi spec for this service.
get.description: May return T:System.Net.HttpStatusCode if the document cannot be found.

default.description: Responses cannot be located for this operation.
